node.title: If I were a rich (wo)man...
node.choices: All day long I'd biddy biddy bum. I'd move the Monastery to an island paradise in the Carribbean and open the [gods]' swimming pool to everyone (shhh... except NodeReaper, for obvious reasons). I'd buy the house next door to Bill and blast the Windows startup theme music every time I have to reboot. I'd finally get rid of my Pentium-II. I would fund a research project into building a better the ultimate mousetrap. I would still be Just another Perl hacker, Broadband for everyone! It's on me! I would give the Chatterbox streaming video. I would pay for Antivroom's therapy sessions.
